NL Question: Find the names of all persons who visited at least two different places of type 'Mall' and whose address location's latitude is greater than 51.21 and confirmed time is not null.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[:VISITS]->(pl:Place {type: 'Mall'}) WHERE p.addresslocation.latitude > 51.21 AND p.confirmedtime IS NOT NULL WITH p, count(DISTINCT pl) AS mallCount WHERE mallCount >= 2 RETURN p.name AS PersonName

NL Question: Find the average duration in seconds of visits to places of type 'Bar' by persons whose address location's latitude is greater than 51.21 and healthstatus is 'Healthy'.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person {healthstatus: 'Healthy'})-[v:VISITS]->(pl:Place {type: 'Bar'}) WHERE p.addresslocation.latitude > 51.21 WITH p, v.duration.seconds AS durationInSeconds RETURN avg(durationInSeconds) AS AverageVisitDuration
